div.h2: Welcome to Saint Clair Area School District

p.span: Dr. Greg Koons, Executive Director ofIntermediate Unit #29 is leading the Superintendent Search Process. The Saint Clair Area Board of School Directors invites you to participate in a survey toaffordeveryone the opportunity to provide input regarding the qualifications and experience necessary for the Districts Superintendent. Please take a few minutes to share your thoughts with us:

span.style: font-size: 10pt; text-decoration-line: none; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: windowtext;

br.span: If you have not already had the chance to do so, please watch Dr. Yoder's video to the community on our Facebook page - https://www.facebook.com/SaintClairSchoolConnections. It has been a tremendous honor for Dr. Yoder to serve the Saint Clair Area School District as Superintendent on an exceptional team.

h3.span:
Saint Clair Area School District
Continuity of Education Plan

p.a: Saint Clair Continuity of Education Plan.pdf

br.br: Locations and times for lunches for all children through age 18:

p.span: Saint Clair Area School District from 11 AM - Noon ~ Serving at the cafeteria ramp; in the case of rain, go to the main entrance in the parking garage
Look for the Saint Clair Area School District vehicle at these four locations:
Arnots Addition in the Cherry Street parking lot from 11:30 AM - Noon
Cumbola outside the Firehouse from 11 - 11:30 AM
New Philadelphia outside the Firehouse 11:45 AM - 12:15 PM

Middleport at the Schuylkill Valley Falcons Teener League Field from 12:30 1 PM
Please click on the School Closure Tab for updated information.

div.h1: Welcome to the Saint Clair Area School District, home of the Saints!

h1.span: The mission of the Saint Clair Area School District is to work with the community to provide a safe, welcoming, student-oriented learning environment in which each student is challenged to reflect, question, and create.

div.style: border-width: 0px; position: absolute; overflow: hidden; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; left: 3px; top: 131px; width: 1px; height: 1px;
div.div: Our schools Title I program is designed to support all of our students by providing extra support in the areas of reading, writing, and math. Parent engagement is key to making this program and our whole school successful, so we are asking for your help. Please take a few minutes to fill out this survey. Together we can ensure that opportunities for parent and family engagement are fun, informative, and help our children perform their best in school.

Click on this link to take you to the survey.https://forms.gle/S7rwqRBP1JTMwJdA6 The link for this surveywill also be shared on our school's facebook page, as well as, on our school website.This survey replaces the paper version we've used in previous years. If you prefer to have a paper copy, please let us know.

We'd appreciate if you would complete this survey by the end of May. The results of the survey will be shared through our Title I Newsletters and at Title I Family events. Then together, we can use the information to help plan future programs and events. If you have anyquestions, please contact Miss Oakley (oakley@saintclairsd.org) Title I Coordinator.

div.style: border-width: 0px; position: absolute; overflow: hidden; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; left: 3px; top: 131px; width: 1px; height: 1px;
